data.meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
data.sentence: The word نَارٌ comes from the root ن و ر and is associated with the meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.

data.meanings: To protect/prohibit/guard/defend against encroachment/attack. A thing prohibited. Vehement/angry, it was/became hot (e.g. day, oven), disdain/scorn/indignation.
data.sentence: The word حَامِيَةٌ comes from the root ح م ي and is associated with the meanings: To protect/prohibit/guard/defend against encroachment/attack. A thing prohibited. Vehement/angry, it was/became hot (e.g. day, oven), disdain/scorn/indignation.
